oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Disconnected 2-factors in planar cubic bridgeless graphs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DIWAN, AA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove that every planar cubic bridgeless graph with at least six vertices has a disconnected 2-ractor, that is a 2-factor which is not a Hamilton cycle. This is in contrast to the fact that there exist arbitrarily large cubic bridgeless graphs in which every 2-factor is a Hamilton cycle. .
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF COMBINATORIAL THEORY SERIES B, 84(2), 249-259
